name: BB 1 1/2: The Unexpected School
description:
You know the drill. It's another sub-game of this series.

The game is still in development, and some hallways are subject to change and/or improve in later updates.

If you are unable to play the game. Let me know, and I will try to fix it.

Also, if you catch any bugs, report them to me as soon as possible.

This game IS ALSO what it seems...

Baldi's rearranged schoolhouse contains a bunch of characters, some custom and others totally original. More often than not, each character has a function that has an effect towards gameplay. Also, additional tasks and structures intentionally make the game more mysterious. Additional locations include: Magic Man's Room, the kitchen, the Scientific Research Facility, the power supply zone, and ţ̸̛̠̥͓̮̿͐h̴̻̔e̴̡̢̪͚͇͋͜ ̴̹̠́͑̌͂̈́̅͝R̵̻͗́͋̚Ū̷̡̫̱͐̍̅͊S̵̛͖͍̜̠̬̼̝̆͒̂̓͠T̵̳̮̪̯͕̆͒̋̈́ ̶̳̐̚L̸̙̆̎̈́͝a̴̤̖͔̫̝̙͗͒̓̈́̌b̶̢̨͒̓̿̕ỷ̶̺̘̜̲̥̜̯͝͝r̶̢͈̦͓̔̅i̵͔̥͉̰̣̎̒̏͝ń̶̖̤̱̈́̆͌̇͜t̸̨̥͎̑̎̂h̸̛̙̣͍̊̀͝ͅNot only is this a survival game, it's also a puzzle too. Oh, and before I forget to mention, this very game consists of content that originates from the Full Game Demo, and BB+.

Story:

It's been quite some time, and a few hallways have been rearranged for "maze purposes". Some character behaviors have also changed, and new characters joined the school. I don't really know what else to say.

New Content:Characters:
  • Plague Crowter Ph.D. (Replacing the Princess)
  • Pencil Horse (Goes by many names)
  • Mortimer
  • Chanel Crawford
  • The "Egg" Guy
  • 0-Headed Baldi
  • Custodytime (Concept)
Items
  • Car Wash
  • ???
Other
  • Electrical Panel in the Power Supply Zone
  • New School music
  • Phonty has new idle music
  • Presets now added to the character selection scene
  • Back button is also added to the character selection scene
  • Hide-and-seek mode!!!
  • Location Debut: The Unfinished Room (Replacing The Rusty Room)
  • A faculty room has moved
  • New Magic Man Spell
    • Baldi's speed now decreases instead of increases
How to Play:

Use "A" and "D" to sidestep, the vertical arrow keys to move forward/backward, and move your mouse to point in a direction. Collect 5,000 XP points or more to receive the good ending when you successfully exit Baldi's Schoolhouse. You know the rest.

Credits:

Basic Programs Used:

  • Unity
  • GIMP
  • Audacity
  • Anim8or
  • Text-to-Speech
  • Paint.NET
  • EaseUS RecExperts
  • 2 Computers: Mac (For exclusive TTS voices) and Windows (For file extraction from other games)

Text-to-Speech Programs Used:

  • Dr. Sbaitso
  • IBM Watson
  • MacInTalk
  • Cereproc
  • Cepstral (Including Voiceforge)
  • Microsoft
FAQ

To view the FAQ, look at the bottom section of the BB 1 1/2: The Adequate School description.

Let me know what bugs I should fix, or suggestions I could add.

This edutainmental software is protected under fair use
